name: The Robbery Online Quiz | 'Seinfeld' - Season 1 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who is in charge of the apartment when Jerry is away?
questions.explanation:
Elaine.

	Elaine is happy to watch the apartment because her roommate is bothering her by singing show tunes.  Jerry is away for two or three days.

questions.text: Where is Jerry going on his trip?
questions.explanation:
Minneapolis.

	Jerry has four shows to perform in Minneapolis, so he leaves the apartment to Elaine for the weekend.

questions.text: What is not stolen from Jerry's apartment when he's on his trip?
questions.explanation:
Microwave.

	Jerry is surprised to come back home with many electronics missing and a leather jacket.  Kramer left the apartment door open and burglars got in.

questions.text: How many bedrooms are in the available apartment that Jerry looks at?
questions.explanation:
Two.

	George emphasizes that there are two bedrooms, but Jerry can't see why he'd need more than one.  The apartment is a little big for just one person.

questions.text: What is not in the available apartment?
questions.explanation:
A fountain.

	George and Elaine are ecstatic about the fireplace, but Jerry doesn't know how he'd get any firewood into the apartment.  Elaine says that it's delivered.

questions.text: What does Jerry try to sell to Elaine when she's moving into his apartment?
questions.explanation:
The couch.

	Jerry wants to give her the couch for one hundred and fifty dollars, but Elaine says she'll pay twenty bucks.

questions.text: During the coin flip for the apartment, does George pick heads or tails?
questions.explanation:
heads.

	Jerry ends up winning when the coin lands on tails, but George fights for the apartment by saying that the counter caused an interference.

None of these.

	Jerry feels too much guilt in taking the apartment and George won't take it, so no one gets it.  The price is too far out of Elaine's price range.  Eventually, a waitress moves in.

questions.text: Does Kramer find Jerry's stolen stuff?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Although he looks for it, he doesn't find anything.  He had a hunch that it was an English man who lived down the hall, but it wasn't him.

questions.text: Are there any scenes at Monk's in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Jerry and George eat at the restaurant late in the episode after they fight over who wins the apartment.
